title: "Synaptiq and AlgoLook Demo Machine Vision Mask Detection Model at 2021 NSC Safety Congress and Expo"
excerpt: "The demo will be featured in the conference's new NSC Technology Safety Pavilion, at Booth 1975 on the conference floor , and will be available for conference attendees to test. The novel machine vision model uses a deep neural network trained on thousands of images to detect the presence or absence of masks in milliseconds."
